author: Staff Reporter
text:
Young Entrepreneur School (YES), the entrepreneur development forum of Tamil Nadu Chamber Foundation, is opening its new chapter here on January 12.

The introductory meeting and orientation of YES would be held at Hotel Ashwa Park near Redipatti Junction on the Steel Plant Road.

S. Rethinavelu, Senior president of TN Chamber of Commerce and Industry, N. Jegatheesan, president the chamber and V. Neethi Mohan, chairman of YES, would be the key speakers during the meeting.

YES is a unique forum for entrepreneurs, with seven chapters across the State having 1,000 members.

The forum fosters passionate entrepreneurs with excellent opportunities to upgrade their practical knowledge and to stay abreast of current business practices, through its regular meetings, residential workshops and international delegations and cross-learning clusters.

For further details and registration contact 7373014461 or 9443240260.
title: Young Entrepreneur School to open new chapter in Salem
